page.title: 02EMPLOYMENT IN TRELAWNYD
page.content: Trelawnyd Garden Centre has been established for l7 years. It is run as a family business with 10 part time workers. They sell a wide variety of trees,sheds,greenhouses and aquatics. The customers are drawn from the Llandudno _ Ruthin _ Northop area. They specialise in Conifers and roses,selling their conifers both wholesale and retail. Whilst they produce 75% of their stock, they supplement their plants with stock from U.K. and Holland. They are aware that local gardeners requests for plants varieties are becoming more discerning and they are stocking a much wider range of plants. Customers are requesting more garden furniture, combining it with Barbeque equipment.
